webclient
Class WebClient

java.lang.Object
  webclient.WebClient

public class WebClient
extends java.lang.Object

The class WebClient implements a Jersey Client to create and send REST-HTTP-Requests to the REST-Servlet-classes in the rest-package

Author:
Wolfgang Ostermeier

Constructor Summary
WebClient(java.lang.String host)
          The constructor initializes a WebClient instance with a host address and a Jersey Client instance

Method Detail

changeExpEditor

public int changeExpEditor(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String firstname,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String email,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           java.lang.String phone,
                           java.lang.String organisation)
This method initializes a change operation on an ExpEditor object on an SQL database via REST-request

Parameters:
id - primary key of the ExpEditor object for localization
firstname - changeable attribute, "-1" for no change
name - changeable attribute, "-1" for no change
email - changeable attribute, "-1" for no change
password - changeable attribute, "-1" for no change
phone - changeable attribute, "-1" for no change
organisation - changeable attribute, "-1" for no change
Returns:
the HTTP status code received after sending the REST-request

public ExpEditor getExpEditor(java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String password)

Parameters:

password - password attribute of wanted ExpEditor object
Returns:
the wanted ExpEditor object

moveMultipleExpScriptSections

public int moveMultipleExpScriptSections(java.lang.String selItems,
                                         java.lang.String position)
This method initializes a change operation of the position attribute of multiple ExpScriptSection objects and the adjustment of the position attribute of affected ExpScriptSection objects via REST-request

Parameters:
selItems - primary keys of the ExpScriptSection objects to be changed
position - new value for the position attribute of the first ExpScriptSection object
Returns:
the HTTP status code received after sending the REST-request

public java.lang.String pasteExperiment(java.lang.String pasteID,
                                        java.lang.String targetID,
                                        java.lang.String expeditorid)
This method creates a copy of an Experiment object and inserts it into a target parent object

Parameters:
pasteID - the primary key of the Experiment object to be copied
targetID - the primary key of the target parent object
expeditorid - the primary key of the acting ExpEditor
Returns:
the primary key of the new Experiment object
